thread.section_title: The Yorkshire Soap Company Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of yorkshiresoap.co.uk
thread.title: Mary
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: Today I ordered online for the first time, normally I shop in store. From start to finish I can't believe how incredible the service was. I received my order the following day :), I had a problem with one of the soaps, after mailing Ed, this was rectified straight away, and j received a replacement the following day. Amazing! I will not hesitate to shop online again with this company.
